definitions: a person who tracks someone or something by following their trail.
shortDefinitions: person who tracks person or thing by following their trail

definitions: a device that follows and records the movements of someone or something

examples.text: electronic trackers are now showing ornithologists where the birds go

shortDefinitions: device that follows and records movements of person or thing

definitions: a connecting rod in the mechanism of some organs.
shortDefinitions: connecting rod in mechanism of organ
